translation.en: Officers, take him away.
But nobody even gave me a present. If nobody got it...
translation.es: Pero nadie me dio un regalo. Si nadie lo recibió...

translation.en: Can't I-- That's rude.
- Well, thanks for having me. - That was crazy. Thank God it's all over.
translation.es: -Gracias por invitarme. -Qué locura. Gracias a Dios ya terminó.

translation.en: Detective!
- Uh- oh. - You wanted a present from the table?
Well, my magic hands wrapped something nice and big for you,
translation.es: Mis manos mágicas le han envuelto algo bonito y grande,

translation.en: and it's going to blow you away!
- Oh, no. -
Careful.
A real bomb!
- Look, we need to evacuate. - No time for that.
translation.es: -Tenemos que evacuar. -No hay tiempo para eso.

translation.en: This entire building is going to blow.
translation.es: Todo el edificio va a explotar.

translation.en: - Fifty- five seconds, MacGruber! - Let me see it.
Oh my God! There are three wires, red, green, and blue.
translation.es: Hay tres cables: rojo, verde y azul.

translation.en: - Right. - No!
- You're lucky. - Good instincts.
We're not prepared for that.
Cut the correct wire, the bomb will disarm.
translation.es: Si cortas el cable correcto, la bomba se desactivará.

translation.en: If you cut the wrong one, we all die.
translation.es: Si cortas el cable correcto, la bomba se desactivará. Si cortas el incorrecto, moriremos.

translation.en: You seem comfortable with explosives. You have to run point on this.
translation.es: Parece que sabes de explosivos. Tú te encargarás.

translation.en: Cut the right one, you decide.
translation.es: Corta el cable correcto, ustedes deciden.

translation.en: Consensus. Talk together about what to do.
translation.es: Consenso. Decidan juntos lo que se hará.

translation.en: I think maybe red, the pliers are red.
translation.es: Creo que quizá el rojo, los alicates son rojos.

translation.en: I think blue because it's the only non Christmas color.
translation.es: Yo creo que azul porque no es un color navideño.

translation.en: We're running out of time here.
I'm thinking we just go like, three, two, one, go?
translation.es: Creo que será mejor contar: tres, dos, uno, listo.

translation.en: Or do we go one, two, three?
- Do we do it on three? - We don't have time for this!
translation.es: -¿Lo hacemos a la de tres? -¡No tenemos tiempo para esto!

translation.en: Here we go!
Two! One!
Pete Davidson saved Christmas and saved the day.
translation.es: Pete Davidson salvó la Navidad y salvó el día.

translation.en: You're the hero.
Pete, Pete, Pete,
Pete, Pete, Pete, Pete, Pete,
- Pete, Pete, Pete! - That was some crazy shit.
- Fantastic. - Wow.
Pete, you came in last second, you really saved the day.
translation.es: Llegaste al último momento y salvaste el día.

translation.en: - Thanks. - Good job.
You trusted your gut. It's a holiday I'm never gonna forget. I know.
translation.es: Confiaste en tu instinto. Es una Navidad que nunca olvidaré. Lo sé.

translation.en: I want to thank you all for coming down here.
translation.es: Quiero agradecerles a todos por venir.

translation.en: It's been an incredible journey, but...
translation.es: Ha sido un viaje increíble, pero...

translation.en: Thanks so much, Terry.
What's wrong, Mayor?
Well, the day may be saved, but not the spirit of Christmas.
translation.es: Quizá se salvó el día, pero no el espíritu navideño.

translation.en: - God dang it, the orphans. - We only have six minutes to sunrise.
translation.es: -Los huérfanos. -Quedan seis minutos para el amanecer.

translation.en: Those kids are about to wake up with no presents at all.
translation.es: Los niños están a punto de despertar sin regalos.

translation.en: No, they're not. Somebody get me the Santa suit.
translation.es: No, no lo harán. Que alguien me traiga el traje de Santa.

translation.en: I'm dreaming of an orange Christmas.
translation.es: Estoy soñando con una Navidad naranja.

translation.en: On Donnor, on Blitzen, on Rampage!
Ho, ho, ho. Merry Christmas!
- Santa, you really came! - And your beard grew back!
translation.es: ¡Santa, viniste de verdad! ¡Y te ha vuelto a crecer la barba!

translation.en: Of course I came.
Every good girl and boy deserves a present on Christmas.
translation.es: Todos los niños y niñas buenos se merece un regalo en Navidad.

translation.en: Thank you, Terry. I mean, Santa. You saved Christmas.
translation.es: Gracias, Terry. Quiero decir, Santa. Salvaste la Navidad.

translation.en: On the contrary, Christmas saved me.
translation.es: Al contrario, la Navidad me salvó a mí.

translation.en: What?
To Terry, from Santa?
It's a Christmas miracle. My noise canceling headphones!
translation.es: Es un milagro de Navidad. ¡Mis auriculares con cancelación de ruido!

translation.en: - Where's your present, Terry? - I didn't get one.
translation.es: -¿Dónde está tu regalo, Terry? -No recibí ninguno.

translation.en: I guess Santa felt I didn't deserve one.
translation.es: Creo que Santa pensó que no lo merecía.

translation.en: No, I'm sure we just can't--
translation.es: No, estoy segura de que podemos...

translation.en: - Maybe Santa-- - They really work! I can't hear shit!
Terry!
Terry, those aren't for you.
- Those aren't for you! - I really can't hear shit.
Terry!
It was for Orphan Terry.
The holiday spirit.
You can't wrap it up and put it under the tree,
translation.es: No puedes envolverlo y ponerlo bajo el árbol,

translation.en: but it's still the most valuable gift I've ever received.
translation.es: pero sigue siendo el regalo más valioso que he recibido.

translation.en: After the headphones, of course.
translation.es: Después de los auriculares, por supuesto.
